SELECT p.*, c.`name` companyname, d.`name` dempname FROM t_post p left join t_company c on p.company_id = c.id left join t_demp d on p.demp_id = d.id
p.isdelete = 0
AND c.name like CONCAT(#{companyname},'%')
AND d.name like CONCAT(#{dempname},'%')
AND p.name like CONCAT(#{name},'%')
AND p.company_id = #{companyId}
AND p.demp_id = #{dempId}
ORDER BY p.id

select p.id, p.number, p.name, c.number as pNum, "post" as type from t_post p left join t_company c on c.id = p.company_id where p.company_id = #{cmpanyId} and (p.demp_id is null or p.demp_id = 0) and p.isdelete = 0
select p.id, p.number, p.name, d.number as pNum, "post" as type from t_post p left join t_demp d on d.id = p.demp_id where p.demp_id = #{dempId} and p.isdelete = 0
